Augmented input requirement

Source: R/leontief-matrices.R
augmented_input_requirement.Rd

Augmented input requirement

augmented_input_requirement(X, w, c, d)

Arguments

X

transaction matrix

w

wage vector

c

household consumption vector

d

final demand vector

Examples

set.seed(200100)
X <- matrix(rnorm(100), nrow = 10)
w <- rnorm(10)
c <- rnorm(10)
d <- rnorm(10)
augmented_input_requirement(X, w, c, d)
